sen.j: 尊朝法親王（そんちょう ほうしんのう、天文21年8月20日（1552年9月8日） - 慶長2年2月13日（1597年3月30日））は伏見宮邦輔親王の第6王子。
sen.e: Monk-Imperial Prince Soncho (September 8, 1552 - March 30, 1597) was the sixth Prince of Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Kunisuke.
Monk-Imperial Prince Soncho (September 8, 1552 - March 30, 1597) was the sixth Prince of Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Kunisuke.
Cloistered Prince Soncho (September 8, 1552 - March 30, 1597) was the sixth Prince of Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Kunisuke.
He was the head priest of the Tendai sect of Buddhism.
He was the head priest of the Buddhist Tendai sect.
He was the head priest of the Buddhist Tendai sect.

tit.cmt: 天皇のファイルでは"Career"という用語は使用不可とありましたが、適語がわかりませんので、ＮＣをお願いします。 "Career" -> "Background" に変更しました。

sen.j: 弘治元年（1555年） 青蓮院を継ぐ。
永禄6年（1563年） 得度し、尊朝と号す。
sen.e: In 1563 he entered the Buddhist priesthood and named Soncho.
In 1563 he entered the Buddhist priesthood and was named Soncho.
In 1563 he entered the Buddhist priesthood and was named Soncho.

sen.j: 尊朝法親王は書道に優れ、青蓮院流から、その別流の尊朝流を創立した。
sen.e: Monk-Imperial Prince Soncho was talented in calligraphy, he established another style of calligraphy, Soncho style out of Shoren-in Style.
Monk-Imperial Prince Soncho was talented in calligraphy, he established another style of calligraphy, the Soncho style out of Shoren-in Style.
Cloistered Imperial Prince Soncho was talented in calligraphy, he established another style of calligraphy, the Soncho style out of Shoren-in Style.
